name: Pokémon Psychic Adventures
overview: Pokemon Psychic Adventures GBA: In this game is Pokemon Psychic Adventures you can have new rivals and all gym leaders are girls. So you can control and share sweet kisses with with her! But You should try to train your Pokemon to get a higher level! Anyway. You have to make decisions wisely and with full attention. The new Pokémon named Drowzee can make your game easy for you. Also, there are some new sprites and tiles.
